Yellowknife, the remote capitol of the Northwest Territories, is home to one of the last and largest dumps in North America open to the public for salvaging. Mined by a colorful community of thrifty locals, it has long played a central role in the city\\\\u2019s civic and social life. But government bureaucrats are determined to see it tamed, and the battle for Yellowknife\\\\u2019s identity is on. \\\\u00a0\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/SALVAGE-481x410.jpeg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"-223088593198762539\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"The Amiss Advice of Anna Lou\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" A young tomboy internalizes inappropriate advice from her alcoholic grandmother to try to earn her guarded love.\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Anna-Lou-481x410.jpg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"6716346994528376481\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Portraits of my mother (Retratos de mi madre)\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" This is a documentary about my mother and the moment that changed her life. Through her narration, my mother confesses to me what she remembers from the moment she was raped as a child. By painfully recalling this traumatic moment, she reflects on the sexual abuse of children and the scars that these events leave in a person\\\\u2019s life.\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/portraits-481x410.png\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"4797412275151590605\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Far From the Apple Tree\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" Judith, a struggling artist, gets her dream job of working for a renowned visual artist named Roberta Roslyn. While cataloging Roberta\\\\u2019s work she is shocked to keep seeing a girl who closely resembles herself, she learns that this girl is actually her boss\\\\u2019s missing daughter Maddy. As she investigates the mystery of just what could have happened to this girl, she starts to develop a new persona and it comes to a point where she must decide if she is to leave her job or continue and risk losing who she is. \\\\u00a0\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/apple-tree-481x410.jpeg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"-5334250952361404669\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"The Phantom 52\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" Loneliness is a trucker who calls out on his CB radio waiting for a reply that never comes; A ghost that haunts the deserted highways; and a whale that sings at a frequency no other whale can even hear.\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/phantom-481x410.jpeg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"-2320484242709082506\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Crab Special\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" Two chefs happen to meet on the beach the day they both lose their jobs. As the grey dust cloud overcame him, Fetter believed that his life would then be over. \\\\u201cA Blue Sky Like No Other\\\\u201d is a documentary short in which Fetter offers an eyewitness perspective of that day, memorializes the heroes who lost their lives while saving others, and explains how surviving that tragedy led him to change his life by leaving Wall Street and heading West. \\\\u201cBlue Sky\\\\u201d is based on Fetter\\\\u2019s one-person play that he earlier presented in New York City (where it was designated a Critics\\\\u2019 Pick by Time Out New York) and Rochester (NY). \\\\u00a0\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/blue-sky-481x410.jpeg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"6113213946827065756\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Badhaai Ho (Congratulations)\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"Headliner\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" In this hysterical Hindi-language, \\\\u201cNew Bollywood\\\\u201d film, a 25-year-old man tries to suppress his embarrassment when his mother announces that she is pregnant. Elaine and Cassandra Bromfield, two black women, documented their lives and community in Brooklyn\\\\u2019s Lindsay Park Housing Cooperative on 8-mm film. \\\\u201cInto My Life\\\\u201d pays tribute to their drive for self-preservation and self-representation, highlighting the memories, identities, and relationships housed within their archive.\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/into-my-life-481x410.jpeg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"1248731687280521691\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Showtime\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"All\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" Darius and Hakeem dance on New York City trains to earn honest money and escape the crime-riddled streets of Harlem. A woman sees Darius dancing on the train and offers him an opportunity to audition for a Juilliard travel dance team. Hakeem is jealous that Darius may pursue this opportunity. Hakeem begins to sell drugs with the neighborhood goon TJ and succumb to the crime in Harlem. Darius is faced with the decision to pursue this life-changing opportunity or help keep Hakeem out of trouble\\\", \\\"source\\\": \\\"https://www.adkfilmfestival.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Showtime-481x410.jpg\\\"}}\"", "\"{\\\"7114128461390627407\\\": {\\\"title\\\": \\\"Nora Ephron Goes To Prison\\\", \\\"category\\\": \\\"Comedy\\\", \\\"description\\\": \\\" Two women from very different worlds meet in unexpected circumstances.
